Description: A template outlining metadata to be collected for each slide in a spatial transcriptomic or imaging based dataset.
DependsOn: Component, assay, specimenModality, sampleProcessingBatch, dataCollectionBatch, targetPanel, targetPanelSynID, targetPanelSize

Description: A data contributor template outlining metadata to be collected as file annotations for imaging-based data files.
A template outlining as file annotations for imaging-based data files to be compiled by ARK BDM.
DependsOn: Component, fileFormat, assay, resourceType, specimenModality, parentBiospecimenID, biospecimenType, biospecimenSubtype, dataType, dataSubtype, diagnosis, visitID, targetPanel, targetPanelSynID, targetPanelSize, program, project, species

Description: Is a valid value of `specimenModality` that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
Is a valid value of `specimenModality` that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.

Valid Values: Xenium, CosMX, GenePS SeqFISH, imaging mass cytometry, Visium, H&E, serial IHC

Description: Is a valid value of 'fileFormat' that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
Is a valid value of 'resourceType' that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.

Is a valid value of Resource Type that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes. Any file that contains curated data describing an experiment and experimental-derived data, including metadata about study subjects, biospecimens, protocols, assay reagents, marker panels, and ID mappings

Valid Values: single-cell metadata, cell coordinates, target panel, tissue multiarray map, other

Description: Accelerating Medicines Partnership Rheumatoid Arthritis and Systemic Lupus Erythematosus. Is a valid value for 'program' that triggers conditional dependencies for additional attributes.
